name: Tango House Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: This small cosy hotel is situated 2 minutes walk from the Cathedral in Central Krakow. Breakfast buffet is excellent, the hotel staff are very friendly and helpful and speak excellent English. As a lone traveller I felt very welcome. The room was well appointed and clean, the bathroom was especially luxurious. Be aware though, that Krakow centre has a thriving night life and that makes the street very noisy until late. This is Ok with the windows closed but was a problem on hot days with the window open. However, this Hotel is excellent value close to all the main attractions of this beautiful city.
reviews.title: A Gem in the Heart of Krakow

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tango is located right by the main square in Krakow so you're within walking distance to the heart of square. The rooms are cozy and I loved that you can hear tango music from your room. The best part of this hotel is the staff. The owner and the staff are very friendly and gave us wonderful suggestions on where to eat and what to see in the city.
reviews.title: Ideal location, Friendly staff

reviews.text: The building is quite old and the only drawbacks that come to mind are the wooden stairs that you have to go up (not recommended for older travellers unless you're pretty active) and you can hear your neighbors go in and out of their rooms since the walls are fairly thin. That's all! Otherwise, I would highly recommend the Tango Bed & Breakfast - the location and staff are unbeatable.
reviews.title: Thank you for happiness memory

likes.liked: — with kitchen in the room and the mood
likes.disliked: — the step was difficult to luggage

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We satisfied good location and kindly staff and comfortable room.
reviews.title: Great Location and Helpful friendly Staff

likes.liked: — Great location, value for money and friendly staff

reviews.title: can't fault tango house
reviews.text: We woud like to stay Tango House more than days.

I stayed at Tango House end of March 2009 for 3 nights.The hotel is situated yards from St Mary,s Church the top attraction in Krakow.The Church is located in the main square,for location the hotel is unbeatable.All the staff at Tango House made me feel more than welcome and were always available for advise on sightseeing trips,nightlife,cheap places to eat.etc....The hotel itself is a small b and b with a handful of bedrooms.Due to this you get the personal attention from staff which is missing in larger properties.The rooms are great with modern bathroom and power shower.If you are looking for a small b and b with fantastic Polish hospitality,bang in the centre of the city,yards from all the sights and nightlife Krakow has to offer,the Tango House is for you.
reviews.title: Location Unbeatable and Fantastic Staff

reviews.text: I stayed at the Tango House for a long weekend in Krakow with a friend. The location couldn't be beaten. The building itself was beautiful and very historic, with a wonderful painted staircase and carefully restored details. The room was extremely clean and the twin beds comfortable. The breakfast was also excellent.
reviews.title: Great Service and a wonderful location!

reviews.text: However, the best thing about the stay was the really outstanding service. The staff were all lovely, and gave us good advice about sightseeing. My friend left her phone in the bedroom when we left, and they contacted us to let us know they had found it, then posted it back to London for us. Wonderful!
reviews.title: home from home only better

reviews.text: My only slight criticism is that the decor in the bedrooms - while perfectly tasteful - did not reflect the historic quirkiness of the hallways/staircase, and was slightly anonymous.
reviews.title: loved the building

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend this B and B to all visitors to Krakow, it is excellent value and much more interesting than staying in a hotel.
reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tango House was a perfect way to end our tour of Poland. We spent four nights there and were very satisfied. At first the lack of elevator seemed a problem but really after we got our luggage up the stairs (with the help of the girl on duty) they weren't a problem at all. Our newly redone bathroom was beautiful and the room was plenty big for our needs. The staff was very helpful - suggesting tours, etc. The breakfast was more than a roll and coffee - all you could eat meats and cheese, etc. They serve tea, coffee and wine in the lobby and had a laptop with internet that we used to check our e-mail. By our last night it was our routine to make our last stop here for a glass of wonderful Argentinian red wine before bed. The location is just around the corner from everything: sites, restaurants, shopping. We walked everywhere. If you like the feel of a small B&B when you travel, I highly recommend the Tango House.
reviews.title: Happy with our choice!!

reviews.text: This B&B is great! It is centrally located - literally around the corner from the Old Town Square.
reviews.title: Lovely B&B - great location

likes.disliked: — Basic breakfast (but nice all the same)

reviews.text: The rooms are really nice. We had a deluxe but we saw another 'budget' room and it was really nice.
reviews.title: Historic Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a small B&B with only around 8 rooms - but it has lots of charm and character! The staff are friendly and helpful - they will help with tours and taxis etc.
reviews.title: Great location
exactly what we hoped for
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet is basic - but the overall experience more than makes up for it!

My Mother and I stayed at Tango House for two days in late July and we only have positive things to say about it as well as the owner and staff. The rooms are modern and the house is literally a few steps from the main market square as well as stores, sights, and restaurants. We also loved the tango paintings and the music playing that you can turn on or down in your own room..how cool is that?! A great place to stay! Really enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Tango House rocked!

likes.liked: — Location, tango atmosphere, modern room in historical home, great owner and staff
likes.disliked: — no AC (it was summer) but that wasn't too bad because we were out and about beautiful Krakow

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was great little B & B, small and friendly in a great location, the staircase might be a problem to some travellers but overall an excellent find, would definitely go back.
reviews.title: Tango House, a little gem.

reviews.text: Tango House has a fantastic location, no need to use any public transport. The owners were very helpful replying to my e-mails promptly and giving me hints on the surrounding area etc. We also asked for an early breakfast on departure day and were accommodated. The house is very clean with lovely modern rooms and bathroom suites. We were part of a large group and were given the privacy we wanted.
reviews.title: Great location
A mini break from Northern England
reviews.text: The stairs to the rooms could be a problem for anyone with mobility problems this is the only issue i would like to highlight.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Tango House and would recommend this establishment to anyone visiting Krakow.
reviews.title: Not last Tango in Krakow

likes.liked: — the unique atmosphere of this place

description: Located in a 16-century townhouse (Kraków's first public bathhouse), we are just around the corner from the famous Main Market Square. Our dedicated staff will work hard to make your stay truly enjoyable - we look forward to seeing you at Tango House!
